 ******************************************************************************************************************** */import Box from'@cloudscape-design/components/box';import*as awsui from'@cloudscape-design/design-tokens';import{useMemo}from'react';import{useMobileMediaQuery}from'../../hooks/useMediaQuery';import NavHeader from'../NavHeader';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const baseStyles={width:'100%',background:awsui.colorBackgroundContainerContent};const StandaloneAppLayout=_ref=>{let{title,children,notifications,...props}=_ref;const isMobileView=useMobileMediaQuery();const headerHref=useMemo(()=>{const urlParams=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);const mode=urlParams.get('mode');const href=props.href||'/';return mode?`${href}/?mode=${mode}`:href;},[props]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{background:awsui.colorBackgroundContainerContent,width:'100%',height:'100vh'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavHeader,{title:title,href:headerHref}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:isMobileView?{...baseStyles,paddingTop:`calc(24px + ${awsui.spaceScaledL})`}:{...baseStyles,paddingTop:`calc(36px + ${awsui.spaceScaledL})`},children:[notifications&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:notifications}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{maxWidth:'1419px',width:'100%'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{padding:"l",children:children})})})]})})]});};export default StandaloneAppLayout;
